attributes.action: Compulsory by-election if any MPs/Councillors resigns/sacked from current party.
attributes.additional_details:
Majority of the people tends to vote for the Political parties rather than the individual candidate.

It is only fair that that a by-election takes place so the constituency of the affected area have the right to choose MPs or Councillors or the political party that they want to represent them.
attributes.background: The rules needs to be changed so that if any MPs/Councillors resigns/sacked  from their current political party they were elected under in which they have campaigned, then they should be required to call a by-election within 3 months and stand as an independent or for another party they require.
